welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wijchen, Netherlands! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city, known for its historic landmarks, bustling markets, and picturesque landscapes. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Wijchen has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Eindhoven Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
